irobots.behaviour

Class FindAndEvadeBehaviour

  • java.lang.Object
    • irobots.behaviour.FindAndEvadeBehaviour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    lejos.robotics.subsumption.Behavior

    public class FindAndEvadeBehaviour
extends java.lang.Object
implements lejos.robotics.subsumption.Behavior

    This behavior uses position data received via wifi in order to help detect other robots via the camera or to avoid crashes with other robots

    When another robot is expected to be in front of this robot and the other robot is driving in the same direction as this robot, then we turn to the other robot so that the camera can detect the other robot and we can start following

    When the other robot is driving in the opposite direction than this robot, then we turn away from the other robot in order to avoid crashing into the other robot.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FindAndEvadeBehaviour() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void action()
      When the behavior is activated, a robot is in front of us and the other robot is driving in the same direction we are, then we turn towards the other robot so that the other robot can be detected by the camera.
      void suppress()
      Suppresses this behavior.
      boolean takeControl()
      This behavior takes control when another robot is nearer than a certain amount to this robot.
